name: Sciany
summary:
Production Co: Studio Se-Ma-For 
　　Short art film from Polish Animator Piotr Dumala. Created 1988. Credits. Direction, Animation and Writt ing - Piotr Dumala. Cinematography - Grzegorz Swietlikowski Music - Przemyslaw Gintrowski Won Best Score and the Golden Dragon award at Cracow Film Festival 1988. Won Best film Between 5 - 10 minutes at Ottawa International Animation Festival 1988.
